certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate
Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android <7.0

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (.ActivIDActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
metadata.cwe: CWE-532 Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File

metadata.description: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
metadata.cwe: CWE-330 Use of Insufficiently Random Values

FCS_RBG_EXT.1.1.choice: The application use no DRBG functionality for its cryptographic operations.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to no hardware resources.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has no network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings: "alert_pin_authentication_msg" : "Incorrect PIN. Please re-enter the PIN. Attempts Remaining: %1$d of %2$d."
"alert_pin_entry_length_short_msg" : "Your PIN is not long enough. Please enter a different 4 to 8 digit PIN."
"alert_activating_token_msg" : "Please wait while your device is activated."
"alert_pin_entry_length_longer_msg" : "Your PIN is longer than 8 digits. Please enter a different 4 to 8 digit PIN."
"activation1_description" : "To activate your token, enter the Serial Number on the Self-Service Web page or contact your help desk."
"display_otp_clipboard_otp" : "Your Security Code has been copied to the clipboard."
"display_otp_clipboard_response" : "Your Response Code has been copied to the clipboard."
"alert_otp_time_delay_msg" : "Please wait for %1$d seconds to get next Security Code."
"activation2_description" : "Enter the Activation Code provided by the Self-Service Web page or your help desk."
"display_otp_clipboard_signature" : "Your Signature Code has been copied to the clipboard."
"alert_pin_confirm_mismatch_msg" : "The PIN values do not match. Please re-enter a 4 to 8 digit PIN."

"alert_reactivate_token_msg" : "Continuing will reactivate your token.
Warning: You will not be able to use your token until you have completed the activation."

"alert_ucr_entry_invalid_msg" : "Invalid unlock code entered.
Please enter a valid unlock code."
"activation3_description" : "Enter the Registration Code on the Self-Service Web page or provide it to your help desk."
"alert_confirm_self_service_msg" : "Have you entered the Registration Code into the Self-Service Web page, or contacted your help desk?"
"unlock_description" : "Enter the Challenge Code on the self-service web page or contact your help desk to receive the Response Code for Unlock."
"alert_confirm_exit_activation_msg" : "If you exit before the activation process is completed, the token may not function properly."
"alert_pin_not_random_enough_msg" : "Your PIN is not strong enough. Please choose a different PIN that does not have a pattern easy to guess."
"alert_confirm_exit_no_pin_set_msg" : "If you exit before the setup process is completed, the token will not function properly."

playstore_details.title: ActivID Token
playstore_details.description:
HID Global’s ActivID® Token provides proven, strong authentication for remote employees accessing corporate IT systems and consumers logging on to online services, without the need to distribute hardware tokens. 

A user wishing to access a protected resource, such as a VPN or internet banking site, uses the ActivID® Token app to generate a One Time Password. The app can be PIN protected.

The ActivID® Token is part of a broad portfolio of hardware and software based One Time Password tokens from HID Global.

The ActivID® Token works with the HID ActivID® Appliance, 4TRESS AAA Server for Remote Access 6.7.2 and above and 4TRESS Authentication Server 7.0.3 and above.
playstore_details.summary: Convenient and proven strong authentication for consumers and remote employees.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Convenient and proven strong authentication for consumers and remote employees.
playstore_details.developerAddress:
611 Center Ridge Drive
Austin, TX 78753
U.S.A.
